CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. 11 reads: "Home-A-Rama Fashions - Milliners Gloria Darcel and Belinda Blandburg (standing left to right) will be displaying their latest creations at The Courier - WAMO Home -A- Rama fashion show. Show models Gloria Sweeney and Velma Reid are receiving a pre-show fitting.  This is a Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of woman wearing light colored smock, eyeglasses, and polka dot hat with tinsel and greens, standing in interior with curtains with small hex style patterns during pre-show fitting for The Courier WAMO Home-A-Rama fashion show
